## packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```




```{r}
InsectSprays
```

```{r}
ggplot(InsectSprays, aes(x=spray, y=count)) + geom_boxplot()
```


```{r}
InsectSprays %>% group_by(spray) %>% 
  summarize(q1=quantile(count, 0.25), q3=quantile(count, 0.75), iqr=IQR(count),
            lo=q1-1.5*iqr, hi=q3+1.5*iqr) -> is_summ
is_summ
```

```{r}
InsectSprays %>% left_join(is_summ) %>% 
  mutate(outlier=(count<lo | count>hi)) %>% 
  filter(!outlier) %>% 
  select(count, spray) -> InsectSprays2
write_csv(InsectSprays2, "insect_sprays.csv")
```

## start again

```{r}
sprays=read_csv("insect_sprays.csv")
sprays
```

boxplot

```{r}
ggplot(sprays, aes(x=spray, y=count)) + geom_boxplot()
```

nqp:

```{r}
ggplot(sprays, aes(sample=count))+stat_qq()+stat_qq_line()+
  facet_wrap(~spray)
```
